question: What is the name of the leading development institution headquartered in Ptuj, Slovenia?
asked_question_translated: Hvad hedder den førende udviklingsinstitution med hovedkvarter i Ptuj, Slovenien?
answer: Den førende udviklingsinstitution med hovedkvarter i Ptuj, Slovenien, hedder Ptuj Development Center (Razvojni center Ptuj).
answer_translated_eng: The leading development institution headquartered in Ptuj, Slovenia, is called Ptuj Development Centre (Razvojni center Ptuj).
